org.jgentleframework.context.beans
Interface FactoryFilter

public interface FactoryFilter

Interface to be implemented by beans that wish to filter owning injected properties. After bean properties injection, container will be automatically invoke filters(Map) method and pass all of injected properties to the argument of method. The implementation of this method is responsible for filter of all values according to fields which has been injected.

Note: the implementation of this interface will be only effected to fields and their setters which are annotated with Inject and not effected to others such as injected methods.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
FactoryBuilder

Method Detail

filters

void filters(java.util.Map<java.lang.reflect.Field,java.lang.Object> map)
Callback that supplies all the owning injected fields. Invoked after all the properties were injected.

Parameters:
map - a map containing all specified injected fields corresponding to their previous values before injecting .
